content: /tkartthaave! Ninne prasaviccha mariyaamum, ninne maamodeesaa mukkiya yohannaanum njangalkkuvendi ninnotapekshikkum. Njangalotu karuna cheyyaname.

items.content: janam:- svabhaavaprakaaram maranamillaatthavanum-thante krupayaal manushyavarggam muzhuvan്reyum jeevanum rakshaykkum vendi vannu-vishuddhiyum mahatthuvavum vetippumulla dyvamaathaavaaya kanyakamariyaamilninnu shareerametutthu-bhedam kootaathe manushyanaayittheerukayum -njangalkku vendi kurishil tharaykkappetukayum cheyth-svarggeeyapithaavin്re ekaputhranum-vachanavum raajaavumaaya en്re kartthaave! Ninne njaan puka zhtthum. Thante maranatthaal njangalute maranatthe chavittikkonnavanum-vishuddha thrithvatthil oruvanum-thante pithaavinotum-jeevanulla thante parishuddha roohaayo tum koote- orupole vandikkappettu sthuthikkappetunna vanumaaya njangalute mashihaathampuraane!- ninne prasa viccha maathaavinteyum-ninte parishuddhanmaarellaavaruteyum praarththanayaal-njangal ellaavarotum karuna cheyyaname.

janam:- basloosu emo deeletthokku
vadkulhoon kaadeeshyykku
eramarmokku mor malkko-
yeeheedoyo bro vmelse-
daabo-shmaayono-
hau deesau bakyone lo mo-yooso-
kaabel veso-
bthybuse halophu haaye vphurkkono
dkoole genso dabnynosho
vesgaashaam men-kaadeeshatho-vamashaabahattho-
bsulttho dkeeso yoldaasu aaloho-mariyaam
dlo shuhalopho-hvo barnosho-
vesathlebu halophyn masheeho aaloho-deelaan
dabmautthe lamoutthaan-
doshe vkale-veesou-haadu men
bleesoyooso kaadistho-
vshavyoyees-mesthu gedu vmeshthaabaahu
am aabooy-vruhe haayo-vkaadeesho-
hoosu alkoolaan.

content:
nin maathaavu vishuddhanmaar
ennivar than-praarththanayaal
svarggapithaavinneka suthaa!
Vachanamathaam raajaadheeshaa! Ninne vaazhtthum njaan
sahajamathaayu mruthirahithaa-kaarunyatthaal
martthuyanmaar than varggatthinu muzhuvan
jeevanathum-rakshayumekaanaagathanaayu
vimalatha shuchi ennivayulla
mahimaaviyalum dyvajanithri kanya-kayaam-mariyaameennum
bhedamathenye-maanavanaayi
krooshithanaaya njangalkkutayonaam-mashihaa!
Nija mruthiyaalivar than-mruthiye methicchu
nihanicchone! Apparipaavana thrithykaa
svapithaavo-toppam jeevanezhum roohkudishaa-
sahitham vandithane! Parikeertthithane!-krupa cheyyenam.

bhoovilashe-sham
dyvatthaal preritharaaya shleeha-nmaar poyu
jaathikalitayil
bhoothalaseemayatholam nallevan-gelon
kykkolvor-kkokkeyezhum
bhaagyamithe-nnariyicchu;
svarggamahaa-raajyam.
(vaayanakkaaran madbahaayute natayil vatakkubhaagatthu pati njaarottu thirinjuninnukondu appostholapravrutthikalil ninno, pothulekhanangalil ninno vaayikkunnu.)
vaayanakkaaran:- parishuddhashleehanmaarute natappukalute pusthakatthil ninnu. Haabeebaayu, baarekmor.
parishuddhanaaya (inna) shleehaayute pothulekhana tthil ninnu. Haabeebaayu - baarekmor.
Janam: - (shleehanmaarute / shleehaayute) utayavanu sthuthi yum nammute mel than്re anugrahangalum-enne-kkum undaayirikkatte.

/tvishvasicchavaraaya janakkoottatthinu ekamanasum, ekaa bhipraayavum aayirunnu. Avaril yaathoruvanum avan്re sampaadyangalekkuricchu svanthamennu paranjuvannilla. Ennaalo avarkkundaayirunna sakalavum pothu vakayaayirunnu. Shleehanmaar yeshumashihaayute uyirppi nekkuricchu valiya shakthiyotukooti saakshicchukondirunnu. Avar ellaavarotum koote valiya krupayum undaayirunnu. Avarute itayil daridranaaya oruvanum undaayirunnilla. Enthennaal nilangalum bhavanangalum undaayirunnavar ava vittu vila konduvannu shleehanmaarute kaalkkal vaykkukayum, ororuvanum aavashyampole nalkukayum cheythuvannu. Kuprosu deshatthuninnulla oru levyanum, aashvaasatthin്re puthran, ennarththamulla 'barnnabaa' ennu shleehanmaar vilicchirunnavanumaaya yausephinu oru nilam undaayirunnu. Avan athu vittu vila konduvannu shleehanmaarute kaalkkal vacchu. Haabibaayu, baarekmor.

pau-losu shleehaa-
dhanyanchol ketten-ithe-vam:
ningale njangal ariyicchathozhi-
cchingaaruvan vannariyicchaal
vaanavanenkilumaadoothan
thaanelkkum sabhayin-shaapam.
Palatharamupadeshangalaho
paaril mulacchu parakkunnu
dyvatthinnupadesham tho-
ttavasaanippippon dha-nyan.
(madbahaayute natayil thekkubhaagatthu patinjaarottu thirinjuninnukondu paulosu shleehaayute lekhanam vaayikkunnu.)
vaayanakkaaran:- paulosu shleehaa (ephesosukaarkku) ezhuthiya lekhanatthil ninnu. Aahaayu baarekmor.
Janam: - shleehaayute utayavana sthuthiyum-nammutemel thante anugrahangalum-ennekkum undaayirikkatte.

/tnammute kartthaavil bandhikkappettavanaaya njaan ningalotapekshikkunnathenthennaal, ningal vilikkappetta vilikku yogyamaakunna prakaaram sakala manovinayatthotum, shaanthathayotum, deerghakshamayotum natappin. Snehatthaal thammiltthammil sahikkunnavarum samaadhaanabandhatthil aathmaavin്re aikyam kaatthukolluvaan thaalparyamullavarum aayirippin. Ningalute viliyute ekasharanatthil ningal vilikkappettirikkunna prakaaram ningal ekashareeratthilum, eka aathmaavilum irippaanaayittuthanne. Enthennaal oru kartthaavum oru vishvaasavum oru maamodeesaayumeyulloo. Ellaavaruteyum pithaavum, ellaavarutemelum, ellaavarilkkootiyum, ellaavarilum vyaaparikkunnavanum, ekadyvamaakunnu. Aahaayu, baarekmor.

Janam: -haaleluyyaa! Haaleluyyaa! Sthuthiyaakunna balikal thanikkarppippin. Vetippulla kaazhchakal etu tthu-kartthaavinte praakaarangalilekku praveshicchu thante vishuddha madbahaa mumpaake-kartthaavine vandippin-haa leluyyaa.

/thaaleluyyaa-u-haaleluyyaa.
Daabahu le-debahe dshubaho-
shkool kurubone dkaayo-
ul ladoraa-vo dmoriyo
sagoodu lmoriyo kdom-madbaho dkudishe-
/thaaleluyyaa.

/thaaleluyyaa-u-haaleluyyaa
sthuthi balikalanaccherituvin,
kartthru-praakaare-nirmmalakaazhchayumaayu
kartthane sthuthicheyu, madbahaa mumpil
/thaaleluyyaa.

shushrooshakkaaran:- baarekmor. Naam atakkatthotum jayatthotum vanakkatthotum chevi kotutthu nammute mumpaake vaayikkappetunna nammute kartthaaveshumashihaayute vishuddha evangeliyonile, dyvatthin്re jeevinulla vachanangalute ariyippine kelkkanam.
pattakkaaran:- (patinjaarottu thirinju ninnukondu) (shlomo lkulakoon) ningalkkellaavarkkum samaadhaanam undaayirikkatte
janam :- avitatthe aathmaavinotukoote-dyvamaaya kartthaavu njangaleyum yogyaraakkittheerkkumaaraakatte.

Pattakkaaran :- (evangeliyon kaadeesho ...) jeevan nalkunna prasamgamaaya (suvisheshamaaya) nammute kartthaaveshumashihaayute vishuddha evangeliyon, lokatthinu jeevanum rakshayum praghoshikkunna prasamgakanaaya (inna) shleehaayilninnu (suvisheshakanaaya inna evangeli saayilninnu.)

janam :- vannavanum varuvaanirikkunnavanumaayavan vaazhtthappettavanaakunnu-nammute rakshaykkaayi thanne ayacchavanu sthuthikalum naam ellaavaruteyum mel thante anugra hangalum ennekkum undaayirikkatte.

Pattakkaaran :-(bsabino hokkil ...) vishuddha kanyakamariyaamilninnu shareeriyaayittheernna dyvavum, jeevante vachanavum nammute rakshakanumaaya kartthaaveshumashihaayute manushyaavathaarakaalatthu ivi iprakaaram sambhavicchu.
Janam :- (athaathudivasatthe geethamo thaazhe chertthirikkunna ethenkilum oru geethamo chollunnu.)

1. Yajamaanan varumannera-tthunarvulloraa-yu than
munthiritthoppil paniyaayi kaanoro dha-nyaraam
/tpakalellaam than koote panithor-
/tkkavanara ketti parikarmmiccheetum
thaathanirutthum meshaykkaayu  parika-rmmikkum-suthan;
roohu dishaa paarakkaleetthaa mutayu-nnoro-muti
/thaaleluyyaa-chootum makutatthil.

2. Nibi-yanmaarum-jaathikalotevan ge-lon
ariyiccha-shleehanmaarum
nayavaanmaar punyappettor
sahadenmaar maudyaananmaar
dyvatthin maathaa thaanum
nalla maricchorkalumorkka-
ppetteetunningavaruteyaa
praarththana njangalkkeppozhum
kottayathaayittheerenam.

3. Mooshe-aaloho mullumara-tthilninnu
angu vili-ccharul cheythu; kootaaratthinmelum
kooteyathin ullathilum kykkondan adhikaaram
haale-luyyaa uhaaleluyyaa kahanoosaa'-natatthuka nee.

4. Parishuddhaa-layamullil skkariyaa than-dhoopatthe
kykkonda-kartthaave, nin daasa-nmaare nina-
cchinnatiyaaranaykkunna ee dhoopam kykkondu
haale ... U haale ijjanatthil nirakkaname.

5. Kartthaavaruliccheythu, njaan jeevante appam
lokatthe poshippippaan meleennum va-nnu
/tthaathanayacchu vachanamaamenne
/tkarshakaneppol - gabreeyel vithacchu
nallanilam thulyam mariyaam kykkondaaludare
doothasamaanam thronosil - pattakkaar kyyil
/thaaleluyyaa - ghoshiccheetunnu.

6. Akhilam njaanaaraa-njittum
dyvabhayatthe mikacchonnum
njaan darshi-cchilla; thal sneha-tthaale
dhaarmmikanaam yauseppaarnnu mesrem raaja-thvam
mahithan moosha vibhaagicchaan vatiyaal vaari-dhiye
/thaananiyaadyaanmaa-rathinaa-l
/tagniyil ninnum rakshitharaa-yu
thankatthekkaalathu-kaamyam, madhuvilumathu madhuram-paaram
dyvaaraa-dhanaye snehippo-n dhanyan.
pattakkaaran:- naam ellaavarum praarththicchu kartthaavinotu karunayum dayavum yaachikkanam.
Janam :- kaarunyavaanaaya kartthaave! Njangalotu karuna cheythu njangale sahaayikkaname.
Pattakkaaran :- sthuthiyum sthothravum, praabhavavum pukazhchayum, maanjupokaattha…

shushrooshakkaaran:- baarekmor. Anugrahikkunnavanaaya kartthaavinte mumpaakeyum punyam nalkunna balipeedtatthin്re mumpaakeyum divyavum svarggeeyavumaaya ee vishuddharahasyangalute mumpaakeyum bhayankaramaaya ee vishuddha kurbbaanayute mumpaakeyum (bahumaanappetta pattakkaarante) kykalaal kunthurukkam vaykkappetunnu. Naam ellaavarum praarththicchu kartthaavinotu anugrahangalum karunayum yaachikkanam.
Janam :- kaarunyavaanaaya kartthaave, njangalotu karuna cheythu njangale sahaayikkaname.
janam :- aammeen. Kartthaavu avitatthe shushroosha kykkollukayum avitatthe praarththanakalaal njangale sahaayikkukayum cheyyumaa-raakatte.
Pattakkaaran :- (mennaalohonu kaabel ) dyva tthilninnu katangalkku parihaaravum, paapangalkku mochanavum, randu lokangalilum ennekkum naam kykkollumaaraakatte.

Pattakkaaran :- (kaadeeshu ...) jeevanum vishuddhiyumulla roohaa parishuddhan. Thaan nammute aathmaakkalute melum nammute pithaakkanmaaruteyum sahodarangaluteyum nethaakkaluteyum gurukkanmaaruteyum maricchupoyavaruteyum vishuddhasabhayute makkalaaya vishvaasikalaaya vaangippoyavaruteyum aathmaakkalutemelum randu lokangalilum ennennekkum manasalivu thonni karuna cheythukondu paapiyaaya thante daasante dhoopatthe shuddheekarikkunnu. Bathryhun olme la o-lam olmeen.
Shushrooshakkaaran :- baarekmor, divyajnjaanam shraddhicchukondu naam ellaavarum nallavannam ninnu bahumaanappetta (pattakkaarante) praarththana ettuchollanam.

2. Unnatha padaviyileriyithaa
innippol (pattakkaaran)
anubhaviccheetunnorkkaayi
anushdtikkunnee kurbbaana.

3. Priyare ithu karunayuteyum
alivinteyum samayam thaan
sathyasnehatthote samaa-
dhaanam nalkum samayam thaan.

4. Doorasthar savidhastharu maayu
thammil nirakkum samayam thaan
athinaal sodarare varuvin,
orupol karunayiranneetaam.

5. Naathaa! Krupa cheytheetaname
naathaa! Krupa cheyyuka kanivaal
naathaa! Uttharamaruliccheyu
thatiyaarotu krupa cheyyaname.

6. Nallavane, njangate balahee-
nathayotuttharamarulaname
naamellaavarumotthorumi-
cchattahasicchura cheyyenam.
